pages.text: The broom is a convenient flying tool that allows the player to right click on the ride and use the AWSD keys on the keyboard to navigate. $(br2)The maid will also ride on broom when she is near the broom, and the maid who sits on the broom will move in flight status in most cases.
Tuttavia, solo i giocatori in creativa possono cavalcare le scope. Puoi modificare questa opzione nei file di configurazione.
